body:
Alright, basically what you do is post downloads of texture packs you think are good. This method could benefit the community by exploring a variety of packz that they would want to check out!  


Without further ado, let's get dem packz rollin'

InfoLag's PvP Faithful edit. Gives higher FPS than you'd expect. 

then Dokucraft is good as well 
Was looking to finish Splade and I's pack that I've took over with a sword that I had in mind.
